contactpage-affcom-user-group-name-label:
'''Yu'urɛ'''
* puti'irɛ bua yu'urɛ: Wikimedia tuntuneba yizuo tigere [your area or topic]
* bisɛ [[Special:MyLanguage/Wikimedia user groups/Name guidelines|name guidelines]] fu san kelum bɔta ti fu tee la yu'urɛ ayima.
contactpage-affcom-user-group-wikipage-l:
'''Wiki pɛgerɛ'''
* we linking bo fu wiki tigere pɛgerɛ la.
* fu san ka tara wiki pɛgerɛ nanta, fu ta'am [[Special:MyLanguage/Wikimedia user groups/Wikipage setup guide|create a user group page on meta wiki]].
contactpage-affcom-user-group-terms-labe: Mam kaalɛ de sakɛ sira bo wars duma la , la [[Special:MyLanguage/Wikimedia user groups/Agreement and code of conduct|User group agreement and code of conduct]].
contactpage-pagetext-movecomsignup: Beleni mɛ, Dikɛ gɔŋɔ sɛka n ga tilum wa la fu kɛ [[Special:MyLanguage/Movement communications group|Movement communications group]] mailing list.
contactpage-movecom-signup-display-label: N beleni mɛ, Loe fum n boti ba gulesɛ fu yu'urɛ se'em [[Special:MyLanguage/Movement communications group|Movement communications group]] pɛgerɛ
